notes.title: Coding Tips
notes.content:
## Python
- use # to comment
## JavaScript
- Comment out using //

notes.title: Homo Deus
notes.content:
Author: Yuval Noah Harari

### Chapter 1
## Homo Deus - Chapter 1 Summary

- **The New Human Agenda**: Discusses humanity's quest for immortality, happiness, and divinity, outlining the potential future developments in biotechnology and artificial intelligence. 🌐
- **The Anthropocene Era**: Highlights the impact of human activity on the Earth, marking a new geological era defined by human dominance over the planet. 🌍
- **Dataism**: Introduces the concept of Dataism, a new possible framework of understanding the universe through data analysis. 💾

notes.title: Harry Potter
notes.content:
Author: J. K. Rowling 

 Harry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling. The novels chronicle the lives of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
